mapper.select: select sysGuid,balance,state,constructArea,address,cellNo,depositSign,skipNum,frozen,floorNo,mergeNum,houseProp,roomNo,isHistorical,showName from Arc_HouseInfo where bldNo = #{bldNo} and houseProp = #{houseProp} and state = '0' order by roomNo
select t.* from Arc_HouseInfo t left join Con_HouseList a on a.contractNo = t.contractNo where t.contractNo = #{contractNo} and a.isMain = #{isMain}
